author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Krog is the first of the Series 5 Mixels of the Frosticons Tribe.

He doesn't have as much articulation as some Mixels, but he still manages to have good character and decent variation in his poses.

There are some good parts including the transparent blue disc behind his eye, and the 3 icy weapon around it, as well as some pale aqua blue (Medium Azur) pieces.

Quick build time 3 minutes.

He's a fun guy, with some good unusual parts, but doesn't quite have enough articulation to really stand out.
